detail_desc: Short skirt in bouclé made from a cotton blend. Concealed zip in one side with a hook-and-eye fastening at the top and fake front pockets with a decorative flap. Lined.
5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and frayed, raw-edge hem.
Short, high-waisted skirt in suede with decorative seams. Visible zip and a concealed button at the back. Lined.
Knee-length, fitted skirt in soft twill containing some wool with a brushed finish. Wrapover with a decorative button and fringing at the front ,and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Short, fitted skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, detachable belt and a concealed zip and slit at the back. Unlined.
Short skirt in a soft weave with a high waist and sewn-in belt with metal D-rings. Side pockets, pleats front and back and a concealed zip and button at the back.
Flared, calf-length skirt in patterned cotton. High waist with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip in one side. Unlined.
